content: The timing of Non-Able's punches follows the same pattern as his kicks. Watch closely and wait for him to wind up before quickly dodging out of the way before his hit lands.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Able_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Able Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Able Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The timing of Non-Able's punches follows the same pattern as his kicks. Watch closely and wait for him to wind up before quickly dodging out of the way before his hit lands.
